mng: (onom.) ting-a-ling (in compounds such as 玎玲 or 玲瓏|玲珑), tinkling of gem-pendants

exm.mng: (onom.) ting-a-ling (in compounds such as 玎玲 or 玲瓏|玲珑), tinkling of gem-pendants
Mei Ling (girl's name), Zhou Meiling 周美玲 (1969-), Taiwanese gay film director
(onom.) clink of jewels, exquisite, detailed and fine, clever, nimble
be smooth and slick (in establishing social relations)
Ding Ling (1904-1986), female novelist, author of novel The Sun Shines over the Sanggan River 太陽照在桑乾河上|太阳照在桑干河上, attacked during the 1950s as anti-Party
Carol "Dodo" Cheng Yu-Ling (1957-), Hong Kong actress and TV host
Lin Chi-ling (1974-), Taiwanese model and actress
Meiling (female name), Zhou Meiling 周美玲[Zhou1 Mei3 ling2] (1969-), Taiwanese gay film director
